Up

Rank: 880


78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to South America in his house equipped with balloons- inadvertently taking a young stowaway.


Director: Pete Docter

Writer: Pete Docter, Bob Peterson, Tom McCarthy

Stars: Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger

Tags: Buddy Comedy, Coming,of,Age, Computer Animation, Globetrotting Adventure, Quest, Adventure, Animation, Comedy, Drama, Family
